thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: F Cowden

author: F Cowden
title: F Cowden
text:
Two years ago we made the journey to visit family in South Africa, making the trip for the first time from Canada. For that journey we looked at the availability via Flight Hub
This year, I'm making that same journey, but wanted to look a a different route. Flight Hub's visual comparison, the view of the cost, being able to filter out more than one stop, select specific airlines and stop-over locations made this year's decision an easy one. The payment of the flight was simple, the confirmation received within minutes and the ability to create an account for that one location view of all my flights are all features that I know I will appreciate as I get closer to my chosen date.
Thank you Flight Hub - you made it easy to book with confidence :)
